topic.title: Using ChatGPT in a DITA XML Project

body.p: The ChatGPT OpenAI bot has the potential to help with various technical documentation tasks: advice about the standard, small conversions, content generation, writing style and readability analysis.
Below you can see a list of prompts I gave the bot along with the answers. The prompts to the chatbot are presented as codeblocks.

section.title: Advice about DITA XML standard use

li.p: Debate about the type of DITA links to use in a topic.Should I use cross references or related links in my DITA XML topic?
Ask information about a specific DITA XML element.

p.codeblock: Can I use the DITA XML uicontrol element for company names?

li.p: Ask ChatGPT to generate DITA content about a very common task.

p.codeblock: Write a small DITA XML task about installing a software application on Windows.

li.p: Generate a list of index terms from existing DITA XML content.

p.codeblock: Create a DITA XML prolog element containing 5-6 index term elements related to the DITA XML topic below: ....

li.p:
Simple conversions - Convert Markdown content to DITA XML topic.Convert this Markdown content to a DITA XML topic:
# Getting Started
List of steps:
- Install application - Login - Perform task
Simple conversions - Convert CSV content to DITA XML table.

p.codeblock:
Convert this CSV content containing headers to a DITA XML table element:
Common name,Scientific name,Location,Temperament,Diet,Water,Size,Region of the Aquarium,Breeding Compressiceps,Haplochromis compressiceps,Lake Tanganyika,Territorial,Omnivore,"PH 7.0 - 8.0, Temp. 73 - 77 F",5 inches,Bottom,Hard Frontosa,Cyphotilapia frontosus,Lake Tanganyika,Very peaceful,Omnivore,"PH 7.8 - 8.5, Temp 75F - 82F",14 inches,Middle-Bottom,Medium

li.p: Debate what terminology to use in certain cases.

p.codeblock: Should I use for technical documentation the phrase "click a button" or "press a button"?

li.p:
Re-phrase documentation provided by engineers using the Microsoft Style Guide style, change also the person from first person to third person.Re-phrase the following content to adhere to the Microsoft Style Guide, third person:
The action Show only keys with closest relative key scope from DITA Reusable Components / Keys tab was also added to Media tab Settings drop down menu The states of the two actions are synchronized. If you check it in Keys tab will automatically get checked in Media tab

Translate some notes from the engineer's native language (in this case Romanian with a mix of English words) to English, re-phrase using the Microsoft Style Guide style, change also the person from first person to third person.Translate to English, rephrase to adhere to the Microsoft Style Guide, third person:
In tabul Media, in meniul Settings a aparut actiunea Show only keys with closest relative key scope Cand o bifam trebuie sa ramana in view doar cheile relative (cheile cu forma cea mai scurta).
